name: LMOOTP
description:
Years in the future the Earth reached a point where it became uninhabitable for humans. Forced to leave their home, now they have to lived in the stations that orbit the Earth or seek their fortune on nearby planets… Given the desperate situation and the impossibility of living indeterminately in space, it is decided to send one last campaign to recover the Earth. In this situation, you play the role of prisoners sentenced to death who exchange their inevitable end, for a "voluntary" participation in this operation… What awaits them on Earth? Will be hope… or death?

LMOOTP is a round-based action game, created with a pixelart style. Survive alone or with up to 3 other agents in local-coop, either by upgrading your equipment or buying structures to defend your life from Earth's threats.

  • Game Modes:
    • Story: At the moment 2 small introductory missions are included as a tutorial.
    • Endless: At the moment, it only have one map focused on surviving as many rounds as possible against an increasing number of enemies.

This is a project in progress and my first attempt to create a game, so any constructive criticism will be greatly appreciated. C:

I hope you can enjoy this little game in development! Have a great day and thanks for your time! :)
